fg_segments: British Gas Feed-in Tariff Scheme and your personal data
When we are your Feed-in Tariff Licensee, the data controller is British Gas Trading Limited.
This is our privacy notice for our Feed-in Tariff Scheme.
It explains your statutory rights and how we collect and use your personal data.

It describes the processing activities that are carried out by British Gas in relation to our Feed-in Tariff Scheme, the purposes for which these activities are performed and the legal bases that British Gas relies upon for these processing activities.
This notice applies to personal data we hold about individuals (including company directors, or contacts on business accounts, as well as sole traders and partners).
It does not apply to information which we hold about companies and other legal organisations.
We may update this privacy notice from time to time to ensure it is always up to date and accurate.
Any changes we may make to our privacy notice will be posted on this page, and we will communicate any significant changes to you.
You can contact Centrica's data protection officer by writing to:
The Data Protection Officer, Centrica Plc, Millstream, Maidenhead Road, Windsor, Berkshire, SL4 5GD.
You can also contact our data protection officer at privacy@centrica.com.

raw_html:
British Gas Feed-in Tariff Scheme and your personal data
When we are your Feed-in Tariff Licensee, the data controller is British Gas Trading Limited.
This is our privacy notice for our Feed-in Tariff Scheme. It explains your statutory rights and how we collect and use your personal data. It describes the processing activities that are carried out by British Gas in relation to our Feed-in Tariff Scheme, the purposes for which these activities are performed and the legal bases that British Gas relies upon for these processing activities.
This notice applies to personal data we hold about individuals (including company directors, or contacts on business accounts, as well as sole traders and partners). It does not apply to information which we hold about companies and other legal organisations.
We may update this privacy notice from time to time to ensure it is always up to date and accurate. Any changes we may make to our privacy notice will be posted on this page, and we will communicate any significant changes to you.
You can contact Centrica’s data protection officer by writing to:
The Data Protection Officer,
Centrica Plc,
Millstream,
Maidenhead Road,
Windsor, Berkshire, SL4 5GD.
You can also contact our data protection officer at privacy@centrica.com.
friendly_summaries: We need this to provide you with extra features.
We share data with third parties.  We need this to provide you with extra features.
We give you the option to delete your account. We might still keep part of your data. This includes any account information you have explicitly provided to us or specified in the preferences.
We will update this privacy policy whenever we change our terms and conditions.
We need this to respond to requests from legal authorities (i.e. the government).
We share data with third parties.  We need this to respond to requests from legal authorities (i.e. the government).
We share data with third parties.
We do not share data with third parties.
We will update this privacy policy whenever we change our terms and conditions.
We will send you personal notice whenver we change our privacy policy. This is when the change includes significant changes in our data practices (e.g., data collection, sharing, and retention)
You have the choice to opt out by contacting us using the methods specified in the policy. Choices we mention apply to data we use ourselves only.
We give you the option to delete your account. We might still keep part of your data. This includes any account information you have explicitly provided to us or specified in the preferences.
We have a special section in the policy on how we handle children's data.
We share data with third parties.
We give you the option to access your information, but not to edit or delete it. This includes any account information you have explicitly provided to us or specified in the preferences.
You have the choice to opt out by contacting us using the methods specified in the policy.
